subtitleNullable: Can you create a classification algorithm to identify Swahili news articles by c
descriptionNullable:
**Context**

This data was imported from the zindi platform in the context of competition and [here](https://zindi.africa/competitions/swahili-news-classification/data) is the link to the competition The objective of the competition is to accurately classify each swahili news content into five specified categories.

**Description**

The dataset describes 6439 rows of news from different sources in Tanzania.These news are in 5 different news categories from national news to entertainment news.

Your goal is to accurately classify each swahili news content into five specified categories below:

Kitaifa (National)
Kimataifa (International)
Biashara (Business)
Michezo (Sports)
Burudani (Entertainment)
